folder: Soundview Avenue & Pugsley Avenue, Bronx, NY
text:
(1)
Clasons Point Amusement Park (Bronx): The entrance to the park's swimming pool on the west side of Soundview Avenue, between Pugsley and Husson Avenues. The amusement center was later abandoned.

July 29, 1928
P.L. Sperr

(2)
A general view of the bathing area.

July 29, 1928
P.L. Sperr

(3)
The roller coaster within the park. On the extreme right appears part of the dancing palace.

July 29, 1928
P.L. Sperr

folder: Soundview Avenue & Pugsley Avenue, Bronx, NY
text:
(1)
Soundview Avenue, east side, between Pugsley and Husson Avenues, showing Kane's Casino.

July 29, 1928
P. L. Sperr

(2)
The rear of the casino and picnic grounds.

July 29, 1928
P. L. Sperr

(3)
A front view, at a later date.

August 5, 1935
P. L. Sperr
